name: MEDABOTS: F2P Turn Based RPG
description:
▶ Medabots is a turn-based, role-playing strategy game that combines robot fights in battle arenas with card rpg mechanics. Create the best team of Medabots by acquiring robot parts to triumph and win in the pvp arena. Join the ALTERBATTLES and control the battlefield in the ultimate F2P game!

In a dystopian future, the MEDABOTS PROJECT is created so that parents from elite societies can control the world's economy while the MEDABOTS keep their children company. The most disadvantaged people of the planet recycle and restore MEDABOTS to battle in industrial zones and qualify for the MEDABATTLES.

Become the arena master of the MEDABOTS universe in dynamic 3v3 turn-based team card battles, improve your pvp strategy with your battle deck and obtain new robot parts in the Tech Station.

◉ ROLE-PLAYING GAME: ROBOT WAR WITH CARD BATTLES

Create unbeatable rpg pvp strategies with your team of Medabots!

Use the robot parts you will unlock in Adventure Mode or in the Tech Station. Build your team and put it to the test in the battle arena in exciting and dynamic robot battles, and prove you are the master of pvp strategy in the world of Medabots. With each piece you will customize your own card battle deck, so make sure to invest in your robot to improve its robot fighting techniques!

Some of these strategies might be based on applying effects on your enemies like a poison build, or you might prefer attacking directly to finish the battles as quickly as possible, or even try to merge strategies so that you can adapt to whatever your opponents throw at you!

This is a 3v3 card battle nft game, remember that choosing wisely your battletech may put you one step closer to victory!

◉ GET READY FOR ROBOT FIGHTING IN AN EPIC MIX OF STRATEGY GAMEPLAY AND FRANTIC COMBAT WITH BATTLE CARDS AND SKILLS!


· Fast-paced role-playing pvp arena matches that will keep you hooked!
· Attack Battle Cards: Destroy your enemies with direct hits in the arena!
· Defense Battle Cards: “Defense is the best Offense”, hold your ground to find the best opportunity!
· Power Battle Cards: Refine your card battle strategies with specific effects, these cards could be game changing!
· 3 robot families with interchangeable robot parts.
· 24 unique robots, with unique cards and animations. And more to come…

◉ TURN-BASED PVP COMBAT, ARENA TRAINING AND ADVENTURE MODE

· Adventure: you can earn Basic Robot parts by beating AI opponents in 30 different levels. Once you beat the Adventure, a new Challenge Mode will be unlocked with even higher difficulty.
· Training: you can test your team robot fighting against random opponents.
· Multiplayer: three different multiplayer modes available. Join the battle arena and put your fighting robots to the test.

◉ CONQUER THE ARENA AND PLAY FOR FREE WITH F2P CONTENT

· Free to Play: you can earn fragments in F2P game modes, which are required to play in The Real Deal.
· The Real Deal: every match requires fragments to play. If you win, you can earn Scraps, which can be exchanged for pieces.
· Duel: if you don’t have fragments, you can also fight against a friend as many times as you want.
· Free to play 3v3 team combat (PVP and PVE).
· Active community (and devs eager to listen to user’s feedback).
· Trade pieces in the Tech Station and build a new deck for your robot team.
· Get FREE rewards during your adventure!
· And a lot more upcoming updates and events…

Download MEDABOTS and dive into this exciting role-playing and strategy game with robot fighting and pvp arena card battles as you build the best robot team. The ALTERBATTLES awaits you!
